item.description:
Tom and Lee have invited us to share some potluck food and winter cheer to usher in the lengthening days! If you're available, please join us for this social-only gathering in Gorham (about 25 minutes from Portland).

Space is limited and I will start a carpool thread on the message boards...

Please bring some food to share and your potluck kit (plate/bowl/utensils/napkin/cup).

Here comes the sun!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Solstice Gathering
